leaders.name: Rev. Dr. Johnson Adelek
leaders.title: Senior Pastor
leaders.bio: With over 30 years of ministry experience, Pastor Adeleke provides visionary leadership for our congregation.

leaders.name: Rev. Michael Olatunji
leaders.title: Assistant Pastor
leaders.bio: Pastor Olatunji oversees our discipleship programs and community outreach initiatives.

leaders.name: Deaconess Grace Okonkwo
leaders.title: Women's Ministry
leaders.bio: Deaconess Okonkwo leads our vibrant women's fellowship and counseling ministry.
